law.catch_line: Unless authorized under this title to engage in the business of providing security systems services,...
law.text: Unless authorized under this title to engage in the business of providing security systems services, a person may not represent to the public, by use of the title "security systems agency" or "security systems technician", by description of services, methods, or procedures, or otherwise, that the person is authorized to engage in the business of providing security systems services in the State.
